attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Noticed that anti social behaviour is getting worse? Driving standards aren't too hot? Global warming accelerating?

It's all down to the demise of the blue smartie. Hoodies would now be safely tucked up at home with a nice tube of E numbered chocolates instead of mini-motoing over mr patel and his family if blue smarties were here.

The absortion of blue light into blue smarties away from the atmosphere is clinically proven to reduce the effects of premature planet destruction. And wrinkles.

And lest us not forget, driving standards would improve 10 fold. Though I've yet to work out how.
